name: creation_seconds
description: Number of seconds from now when the newly created DAO creation ends

name: min_tokens_to_create
description: Minimum value in tokens for the DAO to create in order to be considered fueled

name: onetime_costs
description: The one time costs (in ether) in the offer to the DAO

name: total_costs
description: The total costs (in ether) in the offer to the DAO

name: offer_payment_period
description: Edits the Offer contract to consider a period of X seconds as a day

name: pfoffer_payout_freeze_period
description: Edits the PFOffer contract to consider a period of X seconds as the payout freeze period

name: pfoffer_vote_status_deadline
description: Sets the VoteStatusDeadline of the PFOffer contract

name: proposal_deposit
description: The default proposal deposit for every proposal of the DAO
